name: Peter Stoica
content: Peter Stoica, Division of Systems and Control, Uppsala University Peter Stoica Professor of Systems Modeling Fellow of IEEE, EURASIP, IETI and the Royal Statistical Society Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences, Member of the US National Academy of Engineering (foreign member), Member of the Romanian Academy (honorary), Member of the European Academy of Sciences, and Member of the Royal Society of Sciences Research interests: >Download >Download >MATLAB codes and presentation slides >A chapter-wise higher-quality version More info: CV (with pictures of award diplomas, plaques and medals) List of Publications Some Photos from the 90's Mailing Address: Information Technology Department Division of Systems and Control Uppsala University P O Box 337, SE-751 05 Uppsala SWEDEN Phone: +46 - 18 - 471 7619 Fax: +46 - 18 - 511925 Email: peter.stoica@it.uu.se Department of Information Technology, Uppsala University | URL http://www.it.uu.se Systems and Control Division Staff
